user_query: I'm planning a family gathering and I want to prepare a delicious meal. Can you suggest some recipes that are both healthy and easy to make? Also, provide me with the nutritional information for the ingredients required in these recipes. Additionally, I need information on vaccination guidelines for children attending the gathering.

TaskList.description: Search for healthy and easy recipes suitable for a family gathering.
Fetch nutritional information for the ingredients of the selected recipes.
Retrieve vaccination guidelines for children attending gatherings.
Compile and present the recipes along with their nutritional information and vaccination guidelines.
